post.author: D.J.
post.content:
Experience with Web design and development
E-business Web savvy
Experience using Dreamweaver, Flash, HTML/DHTML, Illustrator, Photoshop etc.
Corporate and contemporary design orientations
Knowledge of leading databases with integration experience
PHP, XML, ASP, .NET Java script etc.

Please submit your MS word Format resume to djeong@rogers.com
URL samples of recent work would be appreciated.
post.title: WEB Developer
